parameters.name: Stagger
parameters.description: True if this is a stagger weld, false if not

title: IWeldSymbol.SetStagger
description: Sets the stagger property of this weld symbol.

parameters.name: Stagger
parameters.description: True if this is a stagger weld, false if not

returns: True if the stagger weld setting is set successfully, false if not
remarks:
To retrieve the stagger property of a weld symbol, use
IWeldSymbol::GetStagger
.
